words.def: a farm tool having one or more heavy blades to break the soil and cut a furrow prior to sowing
(ethnic slur) offensive term for a person of Italian descent
a person who surrenders to (or is taken by) the enemy in time of war
an air mass of lower pressure
nocturnal bird of prey with hawk-like beak and claws and large head with front-facing eyes
a person active in party politics
op Op art ; a style of abstract art.
